definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: This paper presents a double loop controller for VVVF.

sentences.english: Finally, it is applied for the design of varied-frequency control system under constant-pressure.
sentences.chinese: 最后，应用于高精度变频恒压控制系统设计中。
